decks.notes: The deck focuses on aggressive gameplay, utilizing a low mana curve to quickly deploy threats and apply pressure to the opponent. Cards like Lightning Bolt, Pyroblast, and Magus of the Moon are included to disrupt the opponent's game plan while dealing damage. Magda, the Hoardmaster, serves as the commander, providing ramp and token generation to further increase the aggressive presence on the battlefield. The deck includes a mix of burn spells, creatures with haste, and artifact removal to maintain control of the board and outpace the opponent. Overall, the key concept of the deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast, aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells in order to secure a quick victory.

This aggressive deck revolves around building a fast tempo and overwhelming the opponent with a mix of creatures, burn spells, and sacrifice effects. By utilizing cards that provide value when creatures are sacrificed, such as Goblin Bombardment and Voldaren Epicure, the deck aims to maintain board presence and apply pressure continuously. The inclusion of cards like Jadar, Ghoulcaller of Nephalia and Gravecrawler ensures a steady stream of zombies to further fuel the sacrifice engine. Additionally, the deck contains disruptive elements like Thoughtseize and Demonic Tutor to disrupt the opponent's game plan while closing out games with efficient threats like Dragon's Rage Channeler and Seasoned Pyromancer. It's all about being proactive and relentless in the pursuit of victory.

The deck focuses on utilizing Cloud, Midgar Mercenary as the commander to lead an aggressive strategy in a Duel Commander 1 vs 1 format. The deck includes a mix of low-cost creatures, equipment, and support cards to quickly apply pressure on the opponent. With a heavy emphasis on white mana sources, the deck aims to establish board presence early on and maintain tempo throughout the game. Key cards like Umezawa's Jitte, Swords to Plowshares, Stoneforge Mystic, and Mother of Runes help control the battlefield and enhance the deck's aggro capabilities. By efficiently managing resources and leveraging powerful creatures and equipment, the deck seeks to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory through aggression.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game using counterspells, bounce spells, and card draw, while also utilizing High Tide to generate extra mana and take advantage of Lier, Disciple of the Drowned's ability to cast instants and sorceries from the graveyard. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan by countering key spells, bouncing threats back to their hand, and digging for important cards with card draw and tutoring effects. By maintaining control of the game and outpacing the opponent with efficient spells and mana generation, this deck seeks to create a winning advantage and close out the game with powerful plays from the graveyard.

The deck revolves around utilizing powerful black spells and abilities to control the opponent's resources while ramping up mana to eventually execute a lethal combo with Acererak the Archlich. It focuses on disrupting the opponent's hand with discard spells like Thoughtseize and Duress, clearing the board with removal spells like Damnation and Toxic Deluge, and generating massive amounts of mana with cards like Cabal Coffers and Bubbling Muck. The goal is to assemble the necessary pieces for the combo while keeping the opponent's resources in check, ultimately leading to a game-winning sequence that overwhelms the opponent.

The deck revolves around utilizing Azusa's ability to play additional lands each turn to ramp up quickly and control the board. The strategy involves ramping up mana production using land-based ramp cards like Burgeoning, Courser of Kruphix, and Oracle of Mul Daya. The deck also includes powerful threats like Emrakul, the Promised End, and Primeval Titan to close out the game. With cards like Crucible of Worlds and Exploration, the deck aims to recur lands from the graveyard and take advantage of extra land drops. Overall, the key concept of the deck is to quickly ramp up mana production, control the board with lands, and overwhelm opponents with powerful threats.

The main idea of this deck is to aggressively pressure your opponent using Cloud, Midgar Mercenary as the commander. With a focus on generating early game advantage through a mix of small creatures and powerful equipment, you aim to control the board and keep the pressure on your opponent. The deck includes cards that offer protection for your creatures, disruption for your opponent's game plan, and ways to generate additional value through card draw and mana acceleration. By combining efficient creatures, equipment, and removal spells, you seek to quickly overwhelm your opponent and secure victory in the duel commander format.

The deck is focused on aggressive gameplay with Magda, the Hoardmaster as the commander. The deck includes a mix of low-cost creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. The deck also includes various artifacts and lands to support the aggro strategy, such as Bomat Courier, Mishra's Bauble, and Winter Moon. Cards like Lightning Bolt, Pyroblast, and Flame Slash provide removal and direct damage to control the board and close out games. The goal is to maintain pressure on the opponent and overwhelm them with efficient creatures and spells. The deck aims to win through fast and relentless aggression, utilizing the synergy between creatures, burn spells, and artifacts to secure victory.
